file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-10-02-04 - MAIN-DOOR STEPTREAD LINING PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR STEPTREAD LINING PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the lining panels of the main-door step- treads. B. These procedures are applicable to the five steps of the main door. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL 52-10-02-000-801-A STAIRS DOOR - REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL 52-10-02-400-801-A STAIRS DOOR - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-10-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 2. MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the lining panel from the tread of the main door steps. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the eight or ten screws (1), as applicable. (2) Remove the scuff angle (3), if applicable. (3) Remove the tread lining panel (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-10-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR Tread Lining Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B C A ZONE 811 DET. A 1. SCREW (8) 2. TREAD LINING PANEL 1. SCREW (10) 2. TREAD LINING PANEL DET. C 3. SCUFF ANGLE DET. B 145AMM520035.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-10-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-10-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS DOOR 3. MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the lining panel on the tread of the main door steps. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main door H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the lining panel (2) on the tread of the main door step. (2) Put the scuff angle (3) (if applicable) on the lining panel. (3) Install the eight or ten screws (1), as applicable. I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the main door.
